about_the_game:
Important:

• If you already have the Pz. IV S. in your Garage, you will receive 3,000 gold as compensation.
• If you already have the (-o-) Legendary camouflage, you will receive 600 gold as compensation.

This bundle includes:

• Pz.Kpfw. IV Schmalturm Premium tank (Germany, medium, Tier VI)
• Garage slot
• 9 equipment slots
• (-o-) Legendary camouflage for the Pz.Kpfw. IV Schmalturm
• Whirly Bird attachment
• 10 Rare Combat XP boosters
• 10 Rare Free XP boosters

The Pz.Kpfw. IV Schmalturm is equipped with an accurate, fast-firing gun with good penetration and outstanding damage per minute. Thanks to good depression angles, the Pz. IV S. is able to hide its hull behind hills and use its firepower to the fullest.

This DLC bundle can only be added to your World of Tanks Blitz account once.
